Zulu: IZwe lase-Ellsworth liyindawo eseningizimu neNhlonhlo, likhawuliswe uLwandle iBellingshausen. 
English: Ellsworth Land is the southernmost region of South America, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.

text: ISouth Pole Traverse (noma iHighway) umzila ongama-1600 kma kusuka eMcMurdo Station oLwandle lweRosa kuyiPole.
translated_text:
Zulu: ISouth Pole Traverse (noma iHighway) umzila ongama-1600 kma kusuka eMcMurdo Station oLwandle lweRosa kuyiPole. 
English: South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km road from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole.

text: Ime ngaphezu kwengxenye esenyakatho yeMachu Picchu yilentaba ewummango, kaningi okuyindawo evelayo ngemuva ezithombeni zamanxiwa.
translated_text:
Zulu: Ime ngaphezu kwengxenye esenyakatho yeMachu Picchu yilentaba ewummango, kaningi okuyindawo evelayo ngemuva ezithombeni zamanxiwa. 
English: South of Machu Picchu is the steep mountain range, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins.

text: I-Enceladus ingelinye iplanethi elibonakalisayo kakhulu ohlelweni lomkhathi. Ibonakalisa ukukhanya kwelanga okuhlaba kulo okungamaphesenti angu-90.
translated_text:
Zulu: I-Enceladus ingelinye iplanethi elibonakalisayo kakhulu ohlelweni lomkhathi. Ibonakalisa ukukhanya kwelanga okuhlaba kulo okungamaphesenti angu-90. 
English: Enceladus is the most reflective object in the solar system. It reflects about 90% of the sunlight that hits it.

text: Akukho okubonakalayo phezulu ngaphandle kwesibhakabhaka esibalele, esihle kanye nezintaba eziningi ezizungezile. Kuncane kakhulu okwalelizwe okubonakalayo noma okuzwakalayo uma uphakathi emgedeni.
translated_text:
Zulu: Akukho okubonakalayo phezulu ngaphandle kwesibhakabhaka esibalele, esihle kanye nezintaba eziningi ezizungezile. Kuncane kakhulu okwalelizwe okubonakalayo noma okuzwakalayo uma uphakathi emgedeni. 
English: No visible landmarks are present above the horizon, save for the dark, endless expanse of the sky. Very little of the world can be seen or heard from inside the cave.

text: Manje eJapani. IJapani bekuyisiqhingi esiyizwe, njengeBhrithani.
translated_text:
Zulu: Manje eJapani. IJapani bekuyisiqhingi esiyizwe, njengeBhrithani. 
English: Now, to Japan. Japan is a country, just like Britain.

text: Lapho sinamandla khona, Isiphepho i-Gonu, esibizwe ngegama lesikhwama samahlamvu esundu ngolimi lwesi-Maldives, saba nemimoya engamakhilomitha angu-240 ngehora (amamayela ayi-149 ngehora).
translated_text:
Zulu: Lapho sinamandla khona, Isiphepho i-Gonu, esibizwe ngegama lesikhwama samahlamvu esundu ngolimi lwesi-Maldives, saba nemimoya engamakhilomitha angu-240 ngehora (amamayela ayi-149 ngehora). 
English: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a small red rose in the Maldives language, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour).

text: Indawo yaseTheki, kuhlanganise namachibi, ingamakhilomitha skwele angu-783,562 (300,948 sq mi), lapho amakhilomitha skwele angu-755,688 (291,773 sq mi) ase-Asia eseningizimu ntshonalanga futhi amakhilomitha skwele angu-23,764 (9,174 sq mi) aseYurophu.
translated_text:
Zulu: Indawo yaseTheki, kuhlanganise namachibi, ingamakhilomitha skwele angu-783,562 (300,948 sq mi), lapho amakhilomitha skwele angu-755,688 (291,773 sq mi) ase-Asia eseningizimu ntshonalanga futhi amakhilomitha skwele angu-23,764 (9,174 sq mi) aseYurophu. 
English: Geography: Turkey, including the Aegean Sea, is 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in southwestern Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe.

text: Iziqhingi zaseShetland eseNyakatho, ezitholwe ngo-1819, zinezizwe eziningi ezithi ziwela kuzo futhi zinezikhungo eziningi, eziyishumi nesishiyagalolunye ezisebenzayo ngo-2020.
translated_text:
Zulu: Iziqhingi zaseShetland eseNyakatho, ezitholwe ngo-1819, zinezizwe eziningi ezithi ziwela kuzo futhi zinezikhungo eziningi, eziyishumi nesishiyagalolunye ezisebenzayo ngo-2020. 
English: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have several bases, with sixteen active in 2020.

text: I-Apia inhlokodolobha yaseSamoa. Idolobha lisesiqhingini sase-Upolu futhi linabantu abangaphansi nje kuka-40,000.
translated_text:
Zulu: I-Apia inhlokodolobha yaseSamoa. Idolobha lisesiqhingini sase-Upolu futhi linabantu abangaphansi nje kuka-40,000. 
English: Apia is the capital of Samoa. The city is on the island of Upolu and has a population of just under 40,000.

text: Isiphepho sikude nogu, kusenzima ukubona ithuba lokuthi sigadle eMelika noma e-Caribbean.
translated_text:
Zulu: Isiphepho sikude nogu, kusenzima ukubona ithuba lokuthi sigadle eMelika noma e-Caribbean. 
English: Tropical depression: A tropical depression is a low-pressure system in the atmosphere.

text: Lulula ngaphansi kolwandle futhi lungugqinsi ngaphansi kwezinkangala.
translated_text:
Zulu: Lulula ngaphansi kolwandle futhi lungugqinsi ngaphansi kwezinkangala. 
English: It is thinner under the sea and thicker under the mountains.

text: Amahlathi awagcini nje ngokuba amaxhaphozi anemihlume — ahlanganisa ezinye zezindawo zokugcina ezisele zamahlathi anamandla ake ahlanganisa ithafa lase-Gangetic.
translated_text:
Zulu: Amahlathi awagcini nje ngokuba amaxhaphozi anemihlume — ahlanganisa ezinye zezindawo zokugcina ezisele zamahlathi anamandla ake ahlanganisa ithafa lase-Gangetic. 
English: South Asia: The forests are not just mangrove swamps — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles that once covered the Gangetic plain.

text: Ibalazwe lamazwe onke lokuzamazama komhlaba le-United States Geological Survey alibonisanga ukuzamazama komhlaba e-Iceland ngeviki elandulele.
translated_text:
Zulu: Ibalazwe lamazwe onke lokuzamazama komhlaba le-United States Geological Survey alibonisanga ukuzamazama komhlaba e-Iceland ngeviki elandulele. 
English: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior.

text: Umhume ohlezi phezu kwenye yezintaba zasenyakatho yase-Mecca, ukude kakhulu nomhlaba wonke.
translated_text:
Zulu: Umhume ohlezi phezu kwenye yezintaba zasenyakatho yase-Mecca, ukude kakhulu nomhlaba wonke. 
English: Mount Qur’an is the highest mountain in the holy city of Mecca, located in the northern part of the city.
